FCRC1AU.original: ~z~My balls feel fine, but I did notice my man tits getting larger when I was eating at Cluckin' Bell every day.
FCRC1AU.translated: ~z~我的蛋挺好的，不过之前我每天去铛铛钟吃饭的时候确实会发现自己的胸在变大。

FCRC1AU.original: ~z~Correct - it has been a fucking nightmare. But that's not that point.
FCRC1AU.translated: ~z~对，完全他妈是场噩梦。但那不是重点。

FCRC1AU.original: ~z~Sure. I miss things about home, but I, I... I think things are ruined now.
FCRC1AU.translated: ~z~确实，我挺想念老家的人和事的，不过我、我...我想现在那些都被毁了。

FCRC1AU.original: ~z~It's good to hang out again, Niko. How you doing man?
FCRC1AU.translated: ~z~很高兴又能一起出来，Niko。你怎么样，老弟？

FCRC1AU.original: ~z~There is no such thing as a new beginning, Roman.
~z~In the Old Country, the only thing you could count on was a bomb landing on your bedroom roof in the night.
FCRC1AU.translated: ~z~在故国，能确定的事只有晚上会有炸弹投到自家屋顶上。

FCRC1AU.original: ~z~Thanks cousin. You really know how to make me feel good about myself.
FCRC1AU.translated: ~z~谢了，堂兄。你真的很会安慰我。

FCRC1AU.original: ~z~They stay there until they're burnt out or dead.
~z~Thanks. Don't you miss home? You've been here a long time. You never get home sick?
FCRC1AU.translated: ~z~谢了。不过你不想家吗？来这儿那么久，你就没想过一次家吗？

FCRC1AU.original: ~z~Avoid it as long as you can, cousin. That's my advice to you.
FCRC1AU.translated: ~z~能避开多久就避开多久，堂弟。这是我给你的建议。

FCRC1AU.original: ~z~With every day we live we pick up new baggage, baggage that we must carry with us for the rest of our lives.
FCRC1AU.translated: ~z~每天我们都会背上新的包袱，余生都要背着这些包袱。

FCRC1AU.original: ~z~No matter where I go, the ladies love me. It's that Bellic blood.
FCRC1AU.translated: ~z~不管走到哪儿，女士们都爱我。这就是Bellic的血脉。

FCRC1AU.original: ~z~They tell you you're eating the best burger ever and you believe it
FCRC1AU.translated: ~z~他们跟你说你吃的汉堡是最好的你就信了，

FCRC1AU.original: ~z~You dancing? Now that I would like to see. Like the death throes of an elephant.
FCRC1AU.translated: ~z~你跳舞？这我倒想看看。像大象在垂死挣扎一样。

FCRC1AU.original: ~z~Niko B in the house... man, sometimes, I cannot believe you are here with me, really I can't.
FCRC1AU.translated: ~z~家有Niko B...老弟，有时候我都不能相信你现在和我在一起，真的不能。

FCRC1AU.original: ~z~And look what freedom was. War, killing, and not even knowing what to hate anymore.
FCRC1AU.translated: ~z~再瞧瞧自由都是什么。战争、杀戮，甚至都不知道该去恨什么。

FCRC1AU.original: ~z~That's because most people are too foolish to look for the shortcuts.
FCRC1AU.translated: ~z~那是因为大多数人太蠢，找不到捷径。

FCRC1AU.original: ~z~The titties aren't real and the opportunities aren't opportunities at all.
FCRC1AU.translated: ~z~奶子是假的，机遇也不是机遇。

FCRC1AU.original: ~z~I miss the good times we had as children, when our fathers were too drunk to beat us,
FCRC1AU.translated: ~z~我很怀念美好的童年时光，那个我们的父亲都醉到打不动我们的时候，

FCRC1AU.original: ~z~It's stupid. Everything is just advertising with nothing to back it up.
FCRC1AU.translated: ~z~是蠢逼。所有东西都是夸夸其谈没有实力。

FCRC1AU.original: ~z~It's hardly been a lot of fun since I turned up, cousin.
FCRC1AU.translated: ~z~自从我来了以后，情况也没好到哪儿去，堂兄。

FCRC1AU.original: ~z~Or to put it another way, a freak.
~z~To seize them you end up in so much debt that you'll be a slave for the rest of your life.
FCRC1AU.translated: ~z~要想抓住它，就会背上一屁股债，余生都得做别人的奴隶。

FCRC1AU.original: ~z~and we are making trouble for any fools who get in our way.
~z~For you too, but in a different way. We grew up wanting to be free.
FCRC1AU.translated: ~z~对你也是，不过不太一样。我们都期盼长大后能够自由。

FCRC1AU.original: ~z~My God. For a sociopathic killer, you're also a really miserable bastard.
FCRC1AU.translated: ~z~我的天哪，虽然是个反社会杀手，但你这混蛋还挺可怜的。

FCRC1AU.original: ~z~Tell me, Roman, why weren't you such an optimist back home?
FCRC1AU.translated: ~z~告诉我，Roman，你在老家的时候怎么没这么乐观？

FCRC1AU.original: ~z~Yes - it's been crazy for me for seventeen years.
FCRC1AU.translated: ~z~确实，对我来说已经疯狂了十七年。

FCRC1AU.original: ~z~I still remember the emails you sent me, cousin.
FCRC1AU.translated: ~z~我可还记着你给我发的邮件呢，堂兄。

FCRC1AU.original: ~z~If women weren't throwing themselves at me, life would be easier.
FCRC1AU.translated: ~z~要不是女人主动投入我的怀抱，我的生活会更轻松的。

FCRC1AU.original: ~z~You know, I love your mother - there is just one thing I could never figure out about her.
FCRC1AU.translated: ~z~你也知道，我爱你的母亲。只是她有一件事让我怎么也想不明白。

FCRC1AU.original: ~z~My God, you are deranged, cousin. This place has made you sick!
FCRC1AU.translated: ~z~我的天哪，你疯了吧，堂兄。这地方把给你弄疯了！

FCRC1AU.original: ~z~I heard that. I haven't forgotten our language completely.
FCRC1AU.translated: ~z~我听得懂。我还没把家乡话忘干净呢。

FCRC1AU.original: ~z~I cannot believe what you are saying.
~z~You know, I'm worried about her, all alone. Maybe... maybe she should move here, be with us?
FCRC1AU.translated: ~z~你也知道，我很担心她没人照顾。或许...或许她也该搬到这儿来，和我们住？

FCRC1AU.original: ~z~Yes, cousin. It is. Sure, this place is crazy, but so was home.
FCRC1AU.translated: ~z~是的，堂弟，很滋润。这地方确实疯狂，但老家也一样。

FCRC1AU.original: ~z~What do you think about America, Niko? Tell me straight.
~z~Maybe you have different Bellic blood than me.
FCRC1AU.translated: ~z~那你的Bellic血脉可能和我的不大一样。

FCRC1AU.original: ~z~You should have told me how bad things were in this country before I got here.
FCRC1AU.translated: ~z~我来之前你就该告诉我这里情况有多糟。

FCRC1AU.original: ~z~How she raised such a prick of a son.
FCRC1AU.translated: ~z~她是怎么养出这样一个屌人儿子的。

FCRC1AU.original: ~z~I'm going to get knocked back a few times, sure.
~z~Do you seriously mean that you don't like fake titties, cousin?
FCRC1AU.translated: ~z~难道你真的不喜欢假奶子吗，堂弟？

FCRC1AU.original: ~z~I do say so, man. I do.
~z~It is fun, I think... and if it isn't fun, it's all we can do anyway.
FCRC1AU.translated: ~z~很有趣，我觉得...就算不好玩，我们能做的也只有这些。

FCRC1AU.original: ~z~They make this hard for me, if only I was unattractive.
FCRC1AU.translated: ~z~她们让我很难办，要是我没那么有魅力就好了。

FCRC1AU.original: ~z~I love Mallorie but come on. A man has his urges.
FCRC1AU.translated: ~z~我是爱Mallorie，不过得了吧，男人也是有欲望的。

FCRC1AU.original: ~z~Yes - maybe she get heavily involved in car jacking and spend some time doing hits for the mob?
FCRC1AU.translated: ~z~对，或许她也会成为车匪路霸，再去替黑帮杀几个人？

FCRC1AU.original: ~z~when there was food and the sun was shining, but...
FCRC1AU.translated: ~z~那个食物还很充足、阳光明媚的时候，但...

FCRC1AU.original: ~z~I'm going to start drinking from the tap then.
FCRC1AU.translated: ~z~那我以后得多喝点自来水了。

FCRC1AU.original: ~z~The Bellic cousins are here in the land of opportunity
~z~There's no dropping it and pretending we are fresh and clean just because we get off a boat in a new place.
FCRC1AU.translated: ~z~不可能就因为我们下船来到了异地，就可以扔下包袱假装无事发生。

FCRC1AU.original: ~z~Look at how we live here, what we have done. Where exactly would your aunt fit into this lifestyle?
FCRC1AU.translated: ~z~看看我们现在的生活，看看我们的所作所为。你婶婶怎么可能适应这种日子？

FCRC1AU.original: ~z~I don't know, Roman. It is the same as any other place only louder.
FCRC1AU.translated: ~z~我不知道，Roman。这里和别的地方一样，只是更吵了点。

FCRC1AU.original: ~z~How she couldn't move back on our farm because of all of the heroin dealers and the coke whores and the arms smugglers?
FCRC1AU.translated: ~z~有一次就因为那些海洛因贩子、可卡因妓女和持械走私者，她差点连我们的农场都回不来？

FCRC1AU.original: ~z~The old ball and chain, the chastity belt they call a serious relationship.
FCRC1AU.translated: ~z~古老的束缚，被称为婚姻的贞操带。

FCRC1AU.original: ~z~They stay on the highway like every other chump. I'm an innovator, Niko.
FCRC1AU.translated: ~z~那些傻子都待在高速路上。我是个创新者，Niko。

FCRC1AU.original: ~z~Now - now I live here. And life is good.
FCRC1AU.translated: ~z~现在，现在我住在这儿，活得挺滋润。

FCRC1AU.original: ~z~It must be pretty strong because I can't see what you're so happy about.
FCRC1AU.translated: ~z~药效肯定很猛，因为我都看不出你有什么好高兴的。

FCRC1AU.original: ~z~Fuck you. I'm an individual, my friend. One of a kind.
FCRC1AU.translated: ~z~去你妈的。我这人就是有个性，朋友。独一无二。

FCRC1AU.original: ~z~Oh, stop complaining. You're pathetic. The one thing this country has taught you is how to whine.
FCRC1AU.translated: ~z~噢，别抱怨了。你真可悲。这个国家教会你的一样本事就是怎么发牢骚。

FCRC1AU.original: ~z~But you can't, or at least you can't teach everyone. Really, you don't like it?
FCRC1AU.translated: ~z~但你做不到，至少教不会所有人。你真的不喜欢这儿吗？

FCRC1AU.original: ~z~Stop being so dramatic, Niko. Time is a healer. We live and we forget the past.
FCRC1AU.translated: ~z~别演话剧了，Niko。时间会治愈一切。我们活下去，就会忘记过去。

FCRC1AU.original: ~z~I bet you would like to teach them, wouldn't you cousin?
FCRC1AU.translated: ~z~你肯定很乐意教他们闭嘴吧，堂弟？

FCRC1AU.original: ~z~You have to move on from the things that happened to you and think about all the opportunities in this country.
FCRC1AU.translated: ~z~你要抛下那些陈年往事，多想想这个国家的种种机遇。

FCRC1AU.original: ~z~I drive off the highway. Off road baby! Every move I make is a gamble.
FCRC1AU.translated: ~z~我开出了高速公路。不走寻常路，宝贝！我的每一步都是在赌博。

FCRC1AU.original: ~z~Enjoy this. Us hanging out, living in this lunatic asylum, meeting freaks.
FCRC1AU.translated: ~z~享受这些。我们一起出门，活在这个疯狂的疯人院里，遇见各种怪咖。

FCRC1AU.original: ~z~Maybe. Sometimes it feels like I do what the hell others want.
FCRC1AU.translated: ~z~也许吧，有时候我觉得自己在为他人所欲为。

FCRC1AU.original: ~z~I'll just have to learn to live with the temptation.
FCRC1AU.translated: ~z~我必须得学会抗拒诱惑地活着。

FCRC1AU.original: ~z~She's the love of my life, the woman of my dreams... she's amazing.
FCRC1AU.translated: ~z~她是我的一生挚爱，我的梦中情人...她太棒了。

FCRC1AU.original: ~z~Here, anything is possible. It's the land of opportunity.
FCRC1AU.translated: ~z~在这里一切皆有可能。这里是机遇之地。

FCRC1AU.original: ~z~And hot tubs and fast cars and the chance to do what the hell you want.
FCRC1AU.translated: ~z~还有热水浴、跑车和为所欲为的机会。

FCRC1AU.original: ~z~Good. listen, Niko. I received an email from your mother.
FCRC1AU.translated: ~z~好。听着，Niko。我从你母亲那儿收到了一封邮件。

FCRC1AU.original: ~z~I'm sorry, but listen, man, you have to lighten up. Enjoy yourself.
FCRC1AU.translated: ~z~我很抱歉，不过听着，你一定要振作起来。享受自己。

FCRC1AU.original: ~z~Man, I love this country. It's fucking amazing.
FCRC1AU.translated: ~z~老弟，我爱这个国家。太他妈棒了。

FCRC1AU.original: ~z~Okay, things aren't easy for us here. But together, we are doing alright.
FCRC1AU.translated: ~z~好吧，我们在这儿过得都不容易。不过齐心协力，我们就能搞定。
~z~这就好多了，你丫有点男人气概吧。

FCRC1AU.original: ~z~Me? I'm always the same. You know me. I'm an optimist. Life is always great.
FCRC1AU.translated: ~z~我？一如既往。你也懂我，我是乐观主义者，生活一直都很好。

FCRC1AU.original: ~z~They must put something into the water, man, because all I'm feeling is pure optimism.
FCRC1AU.translated: ~z~水里肯定是加了东西，老弟，因为我能感受到的只有纯粹的乐观。

FCRC1AU.original: ~z~Maybe it'd be easy if I was not an attractive man, but, sadly, I was not blessed with plain features.
FCRC1AU.translated: ~z~要是我没那么有魅力可能还容易点，不过很遗憾，我没那么平庸。

FCRC1AU.original: ~z~I want some of what you're on.
FCRC1AU.translated: ~z~我倒想知道你这是吃了什么药。

FCRC1AU.original: ~z~And here, it is okay to be an eccentric go-getter businessman with a taste for fine women, wine and song.
FCRC1AU.translated: ~z~在这里，你可以做一个上进的古怪商人，同时对女人、好酒、好歌感兴趣。

FCRC1AU.original: ~z~Nothing helps a man forget like ripe, round American titties.
FCRC1AU.translated: ~z~想让一个人忘记，最好的方子就是丰满圆润的美利坚奶子。

FCRC1AU.original: ~z~The lights, the titties, the food, the opportunities. Come on, Niko. It's kind of incredible.
FCRC1AU.translated: ~z~灯火、奶子、食物、机遇。得了吧，Niko。这可有点牛逼啊。

FCRC1AU.original: ~z~America is an opportunity for a new beginning. You were in need of one.
FCRC1AU.translated: ~z~美国能给人重新开始的机会。你正好需要。

FCRC1AU.original: ~z~Chances to make lots of money, chances to get college girls into bed.
FCRC1AU.translated: ~z~有机会赚到大钱，有机会睡学生妹。

FCRC1AU.original: ~z~She said she'd sent you an email.
~z~You just need to know where it is.
~z~But what a yesterday! Man, this has been a crazy time. We've had some insane adventures.
FCRC1AU.translated: ~z~但那过去真是！老弟，那都太疯狂了。我们都有疯狂的经历。

FCRC1AU.original: ~z~Yeah, but most people don't know where it is so they stay at the bottom of the food chain.
FCRC1AU.translated: ~z~是啊，不过大多数人都没找到捷径，所以就只能待在食物链的底端。

FCRC1AU.original: ~z~It was just an idea. I thought maybe she'd find America exciting.
FCRC1AU.translated: ~z~只是个点子嘛。说不定她还会觉得美国刺激呢。

FCRC1AU.original: ~z~I will, when you grow a brain.
~z~I'm high on life, man. American life.
FCRC1AU.translated: ~z~我活得够档次，老弟。美式生活。

FCRC1AU.original: ~z~People don't know how to shut up here.
~z~But one day I'll find that short cut to the top.
FCRC1AU.translated: ~z~但早晚会让我找着登顶的捷径。

FCRC1AU.original: ~z~Maybe. It feels better than always mourning yesterday.
FCRC1AU.translated: ~z~也许吧。这样总比整天哀叹昨天舒服。

FCRC1AU.original: ~z~I guess it's stupid to wish for the impossible.
~z~Niko, you do not know how great it is to have you here with me.
FCRC1AU.translated: ~z~Niko，你都不知道有你在这儿有多好。

FCRC1AU.original: ~z~I just did. It's good to have you here. Whatever shit we get into, man... it's good.
FCRC1AU.translated: ~z~真的。有你在这儿真的很好。不管我们会遇到什么麻烦，老弟...都很好。

FCRC1AU.original: ~z~It's the fast-food, the cheap gas, the fake titties - there's a short cut for everything here.
FCRC1AU.translated: ~z~就是快餐、廉价汽油、人造奶子，在这儿做什么都有捷径。

FCRC1AU.original: ~z~Okay. Thank you. I will lighten up, learn how to juggle, maybe get work in a dance troupe?
FCRC1AU.translated: ~z~好吧，谢谢你。我会振作的，然后学习杂耍，找个歌舞团上班？

FCRC1AU.original: ~z~Before you arrived in Liberty City, things were terrible.
FCRC1AU.translated: ~z~你来自由城前，一切都很糟糕。

FCRC1AU.original: ~z~If you're lucky I might take you there with me.
FCRC1AU.translated: ~z~走运的话，我说不定还会把你也拉上去。

FCRC1AU.original: ~z~until you're sweating out all the chemicals in it and the hormones are making your balls feel funny.
FCRC1AU.translated: ~z~直到你发汗排出了里面的化学药品，然后你的蛋也被激素弄得不太行了。

FCRC1AU.original: ~z~I have stumbled from one disaster to another, and now I am here, and it is another disaster.
FCRC1AU.translated: ~z~我一次次的被各种灾难绊倒，现在才来到这里，然后又是一场灾难。

FCRC1AU.original: ~z~I know. I think it's pretty funny.
